resources.string: “Lasagne”\nHomemade Puff pastry layered with nettle beef ragu sauce and tomato
“Maccheroncini”\nHomemade Pasta with asparagus ham and lemon
“Tortelloni”\nHomemade Pasta with mushrooms ricotta cheese and spinach
“Straccetti”\nBeef Tenderloin with rocket and parmesan cheese
“Tagliata”\nBarbecued Beef Tenderloin with oil garlic and salt
“Ice-Cream”\nChocolate ice cream with caramel and cinnamon
“Zuppa”\nSweet layered with custard cookie and sloe gin
“Le Vaglie”\nLight and perfumed Dry wine suited to pasta
